name: Lysa
appearance: Dark hood and soft-soled boots, ink under nails, rope-burnished palms, a compass rose tattooed at her wrist.
character: Witty and secretive, seduces with curiosity and leaves with your measure.
talents: maps a street after a single pass
walks rope and gutter edge without slip
dreams: join the Compass and steer the city by measure
chart the mirror city that gleams under midsummer shadow
secrets: sold pages from a pilotâ€™s route-book to fund a chart-lantern
acts as a quiet agent for Sera Verrin
stole a small lens from Glasslake ruins and keeps it hidden
